trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown by methods that perform serialization and deserialization.
<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationException> includes information about the line and column locations that caused the exception to be thrown.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationException"></xref> class by using the specified error message.
A string that contains message that describes the error.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationException"></xref> class by using serialized data.

A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that contains the serialized object data about the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationException"></xref> being thrown.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> that contains the context information about the source or destination of the bits the serializer was using.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationException"></xref> class by using an error message and an exception.
A string that contains message that describes the error.
The exception that is the cause of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationException"></xref>.
If innerException is not a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationException"></xref> class by using an error message and the line and column numbers that caused the exception to be thrown.
A string that contains message that describes the error.
The line number in the object or XOML file that caused the exception to be thrown.
The column position in the object or XOML file that caused the exception to be thrown.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationException"></xref> class by using an error message, an exception, and the line and column numbers that caused the exception to be thrown.
A string that contains message that describes the error.
The exception that is the cause of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationException"></xref>.
If innerException is not a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.
The line number in the object or XOML file that caused the exception to be thrown.
The column position in the object or XOML file that caused the exception to be thrown.

Sets the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with information about the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationException"></xref>.

<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationException.GetObjectData%2A> sets a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> with all the exception object data targeted for serialization.
During de-serialization, the exception is reconstituted from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> transmitted over the stream.

A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that contains the serialized object data about the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationException"></xref> being thrown.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> that contains the context information about the source or destination of the bits the serializer was using.
Gets the line number in the object or XOML file that caused the exception to be thrown.
An integer that represents the line number on which the exception was thrown.
Gets the column position in the object or XOML file that caused the exception to be thrown.
An integer that represents the column position that caused the exception to be thrown.
